<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Supernatural Senses](/Feats.aspx?ID=1608) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Barbarian" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=18" />
<trait label="Rage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=135" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 109 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Acute Scent](/Feats.aspx?ID=135) or precise or imprecise [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417)

</column>

---

Your scent is preternaturally sharp, and you can always rely on your sense of smell to help guide you when your vision is compromised. When you target a [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) or [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) opponent while you are raging, you reduce the DC of the flat check to 3 for a concealed target or to 9 for a hidden one.
name: Supernatural Senses
prerequisite: Acute Scent or precise or imprecise scent
